root.name: Disney’s Lilo & Stitch 2: Hamsterviel Havoc
root.description: OverviewDisney’s Lilo Stitch 2: Hamsterviel Havoc is an action/platformer developed by Climax Studios and published by Disney Interactive Studios for the Game Boy Advance platform.GameplayWhile Disney’s Lilo Stitch 2: Hamsterviel Havoc is primarily a platformer, the player will have the chance to play as other characters and vehicle segments.
